name: Halloween Pumpkin Deviled Eggs Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: hard-boiled egg, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, paprika, salt, pepper, fresh chives
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon paprika plus additional for garnish
recipeInstructionSteps: Peel and slice hard boiled eggs lengthwise. Separate yolks into a separate bowl.
Add mustard, mayonnaise, paprika, salt, and pepper to the yolks, and mix thoroughly.
Fill a piping bag with the yolk mixture, and pipe into the empty egg whites.
Sprinkle with paprika, and place a piece of chive to make it look like a pumpkin.
